com.silvergobletgames.sylver.audio

Class AudioRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.audio.AudioRenderer

  • public class AudioRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    The AudioRenderer is responsible for playing and managing all of the audio in your game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AudioRenderer()
      Creates a new audio renderer instance using PaulsCode audio stuff

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllSounds

        public void loadAllSounds(java.net.URI resourceURI)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all the sounds in the given directory into memory. URI can point to a directory in a .jar file or on disk.
        Parameters:
        resourceURI - URI pointing to the directory to load.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
